ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'India (+91)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[6-9][0-9]{9}$") /* India: Starts with 6-9, exactly 10 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'United States (+1)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[2-9][0-9]{9}$") /* US: Starts with 2-9, exactly 10 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'United Kingdom (+44)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[7][0-9]{9}$") /* UK: Starts with 7, exactly 10 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'Australia (+61)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[4][0-9]{8}$") /* Australia: Starts with 4, exactly 9 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'Germany (+49)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^(15|16|17)[0-9]{8}$") /* Germany: Starts with 15, 16, or 17, exactly 10 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'France (+33)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[6|7][0-9]{8}$") /* France: Starts with 6 or 7, exactly 9 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'Italy (+39)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[3][0-9]{8,9}$") /* Italy: Starts with 3, exactly 9-10 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'Brazil (+55)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^[9][0-9]{8}$") /* Brazil: Starts with 9, exactly 9 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'China (+86)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^(13|14|15|16|17|18|19)[0-9]{9}$") /* China: Starts with 13–19, exactly 11 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'Japan (+81)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^(70|80|90)[0-9]{8}$") /* Japan: Starts with 70, 80, or 90, exactly 10 digits */ ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Country_Code__c , 'South Korea (+82)'), REGEX( Phone_Number__c , "^(10|11|16|17|18|19)[0-9]{8}$") /* South Korea: Starts with 10, 11, 16–19, exactly 10 digits */ ) ) )
